item.description:
Turning the Key: Financing Deals with an IRA/401k

Join us in November for our monthly networking and education event, Turning the Key, with industry expert, Mike Hurney.

Did you know that you can use not just your own IRA or 401k, but other peoples IRAs and 401ks to finance your investments?

Mike Hurney will be teaching us how we can buy real estate, notes and businesses in our IRA to supercharge the investment making it either Tax Free or Tax Deferred.

He'll also cover how to use our 401k money on something WE DO have influence over, such as Foreclosures, Short Sales and Private Lending.

This is not only a source of funds for us to use on our own deals, but a huge source of money from Investors eager to increase their returns far beyond meager bank CDs and fluctuating Stock Market returns.

He'll also show us the latest method to establish our own Health Savings Account.

Mike Hurney is a Successful Real Estate Investor who lives on the North Shore of Boston. He's not only a landlord, but he also rehabs and flips properties to sell. In addition, he is also the Director of Entrust New England, LLC, a company that handles Self Directed IRAs, which is what Mike personally uses.


Pre-Register for Turning the Key and save $5.00!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Turning the Key: Financing Deals with IRA/401k
